General.Name: Leviathan Gold Ltd
General.Description: Leviathan Gold Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of resource properties in Australia. Its principal properties are its 100% owned Avoca project covering an area of approximately 106 km2; and the Timor project, which covers an area of approximately 121 km2 located in the State of Victoria, Australia. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1090 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V7

1.Name: Mr. Jonathan Rene Richards CPA, CA
1.Title: CFO, Corp. Sec. & Director
